name: eufyClean(EufyHome)-RoboVac
0:
”Alexa, ask RoboVac to start cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask RoboVac to stop cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask RoboVac to go home.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: robovac
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The eufy Clean Skill allows you to control your RoboVac by using Amazon Alexa.
To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button above to link your eufy account and to discover your eufy Clean product.

If this skill does not respond as expected, please make sure:
1) RoboVac is online. 
2) You have connected RoboVac with the eufy Clean app. 
3) Your Alexa speaker is online.

Compatible products: 
- eufy RoboVac

The RoboVac skill for Amazon Alexa helps you keep your home clean.
Cleaning tips: RoboVac will clean for up to 1.5 hours and will automatically return to the chargning base.
After connecting Alexa to your RoboVac, just say:
 "Alexa,ask RoboVac to start cleaning"
 "Alexa, ask RoboVac to stop cleaning"
 "Alexa, ask RoboVac to go home"

If two or more RoboVac devices are added to the eufy Clean app and you use Alexa to control them, use the eufy Clean app to rename each RoboVac. Names should be easy to pronounce in English and must not contain an emoji or special characters. When giving a command, replace (robot name) with the name of your RoboVac.
 "Alexa, ask RoboVac (robot name) to start cleaning"
 "Alexa, ask RoboVac (robot name) to stop cleaning"
 "Alexa, ask RoboVac (robot name) to go home"

For more information about how RoboVac works with Amazon Alexa, go to https://support.eufylife.com/s/?ref=navimenu_2_copy
If you have any questions on RoboVac, please contact eufy Suppport: 1-800-988-7973 (US) Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (PST)
